REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String Dim vSQLArray as Variant
Sub Formular_init() init_Form_Projekt() init_List_Kunden() init_Form_Steuerung() init_Form_Dokumente() init_List_Filter_Jahr() init_List_Filter_Status() init_List_Filter_Kunde() init_List_Projektauswahl() init_Auswertung() End Sub
Sub init_Form_Projekt sSQL1="SELECT * from "& sProjekte &" where ProjektID=:c" oForm_Projekt.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Projekt.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Projekt.CommandType=2 oForm_Projekt.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Projekt.Cycle=1 oForm_Projekt.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Dokumente sSQL1="SELECT * from "& sTabelle_Dokumente &" where ProjektID=:c" oForm_Dokumente.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Dokumente.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Dokumente.CommandType=2 oForm_Dokumente.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Dokumente.Cycle=1 oForm_Dokumente.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Steuerung sSQL1="SELECT * from Steuerung where ClientID="& iClientID oForm_Steuerung.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Steuerung.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Steuerung.CommandType=2 oForm_Steuerung.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Steuerung.Cycle=1 oForm_Steuerung.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_List_Projektauswahl vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct t1.Projekt_Name as Name,t1.ProjektID"&_ " from "& sProjekte &" as t1"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung as t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " where ((((YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Jahr and LENGTH(t2.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " or (YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) like '%' and LENGTH(t2.Jahr) IS NULL))"&_ " and ((t1.Status=t2.Status and LENGTH(t2.Status) > 0)"&_ " or (t1.Status like '%' and LENGTH(t2.Status) IS NULL))"&_ " and ((t1.Projekt_Name like concat('%',t2.Suchstring,'%') and LENGTH(t2.Suchstring) > 0)"&_ " or (t1.Projekt_Name like '%' and LENGTH(t2.Suchstring) IS NULL))"&_ " and ((t1.KontaktID=t2.KundenID and LENGTH(t2.KundenID) > 0)"&_ " or (t1.KontaktID like '%' and LENGTH(t2.KundenID) IS NULL)))"&_ " or t1.ProjektID=t2.ProjektID)"&_ " and t1.ProjektID > 0"&_ " order by t1.Projekt_Name ASC") oList_Projektauswahl.ListSourceType=4 oList_Projektauswahl.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Kunden vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct concat(t1.Name1,', ',t1.Vorname,' ',t1.Name2,' --> ',t1.Ort) as Name,"&_ "t1.KontaktID from "& sKunden &" as t1 order by t1.Name1 ASC") oList_Kunden.ListSourceType=4 oList_Kunden.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Jahr vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct year(Erstellungsdatum) as Jahr,year(Erstellungsdatum)"&_ " from "& sProjekte &" order by Jahr DESC") oList_Filter_Jahr.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Jahr.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Status vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct t1.Status,t1.Status"&_ " from "& sProjekte &" as t1"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung as t2"&_ " ON (t2.ClientID="& iClientID &")"&_ " where ((((YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Jahr and LENGTH(t2.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " or (YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) like '%' and LENGTH(t2.Jahr) IS NULL)))"&_ " or t1.Status=t2.Status)") oList_Filter_Status.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Status.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Kunde vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct concat(t3.Name1,', ',t3.Vorname,' ',t3.Name2,' --> ',t3.Ort),t1.KontaktID"&_ " from "& sProjekte &" as t1"&_ " INNER JOIN "& sKunden &" as t3"&_ " ON t3.KontaktID=t1.KontaktID"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung as t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " where (((YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Jahr and LENGTH(t2.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " or (YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) like '%' and LENGTH(t2.Jahr) IS NULL))"&_ " and ((t1.Status=t2.Status and LENGTH(t2.Status) > 0)"&_ " or (t1.Status like '%' and LENGTH(t2.Status) IS NULL))"&_ " or t1.KontaktID=t2.KundenID)"&_ " order by t3.Name1 ASC") oList_Filter_Kunde.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Kunde.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Kalenderjahr vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct year(t1.Erstellungsdatum) as Jahr,year(t1.Erstellungsdatum)"&_ " from "& sProjekte &" as t1 order by Jahr ASC") oList_Kalenderjahr.ListSourceType=4 oList_Kalenderjahr.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Monat vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct Monat,MonatID from Monate order by MonatID ASC") oList_Monat.ListSourceType=4 oList_Monat.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
